name: Fabric adhesive tape, black, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X50
description: The tesa® 4662 duct tape has excellent adhesive strength even on rough and dusty substrates. It is waterproof, conformable and flexible. Ideal for sealing pipes and lines as well as for applications on plaster and masonry. It can be easily torn by hand in longitudinal and transverse directions. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Stabilized fabric adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 38X25
description: The tesa® 53799 has very good adhesion on rough surfaces. It is easy to tear by hand, water-repellent, weather-resistant, durable and very conformable. Ideal for various repair and construction tasks, and for packing, bundling, bonding, etc. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Fabric adhesive tape, silver, 48X50 (mm×m)
description: The tesa® 4662 duct tape has excellent adhesive strength even on rough and dusty substrates. It is waterproof, conformable and flexible. Ideal for sealing pipes and cables as well as for applications on plaster and masonry. It is easy to tear by hand in lengthwise and crosswise directions. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Fabric adhesive tape, light green (50 mm x 50 m)
description: The tesa 4621 is an all-purpose fabric adhesive tape suitable for outdoor use. It can be easily torn by hand longitudinally and transversely, unwinds smoothly without rolling up, is waterproof and UV-resistant, and can be removed residue-free for up to 8 weeks. It is suitable for marking, fixing, fastening or bundling. The tape is made of a fabric carrier with an acrylate adhesive, offering high abrasion resistance. Available in neon colors (tesa 4671 series) for high visibility. Specified shelf life assumes compliance with recommended storage conditions.

name: Fabric adhesive tape set, 3-piece, orange, 50×25 (mm×m)
description: The tesa® 4671 has a carrier fabric made of cellulose, is non-reflective, fluorescent and suitable for almost any type of application. It can be torn easily by hand, removed residue-free, adheres to rough surfaces and can be written on. The neon-coloured tesa® 4671 fabric tape is ideal for marking elements or event use. It is available in fluorescent neon colours and is often used by professionals for visible marking of movable elements or during events. Suitable for marking, fixing, fastening or bundling. The combination of acrylic-coated fabric and a natural rubber adhesive provides high abrasion resistance. The tape can be removed residue-free and is available in neon green, neon yellow, neon orange and neon pink. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Fabric adhesive tape set, 4-piece, yellow, Width×Length (mm×m): 38X25
description: The tesa® 4671 has a carrier fabric made of cellulose, is non-reflective, fluorescent and suitable for almost any application. It tears easily by hand, is removable without residue, adheres to rough surfaces and can be written on. The neon-coloured fabric tape is ideal for marking and event use and is available in neon green, neon yellow, neon orange and neon pink. The combination of an acrylate-coated fabric and a natural rubber adhesive provides high abrasion resistance. Minimum shelf life assumes specified storage conditions.

name: Fabric adhesive tape, UV-resistant, blue-gray (48×23 mm×m)
description: The 3M™ 8979, due to its conformable structure and UV resistance, is suitable for permanent and temporary applications indoors and outdoors. It is also water-repellent and can be used for sealing. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Recycled Fabric Heavy Duct Tape, black, 50 mm × 50 m
description: The tesa 60462 is a robust, more sustainable duct tape made from recycled material and our well-known solvent-free synthetic rubber adhesive. Features: 67% of the carrier material consists of recycled plastics (PCR); immediate excellent adhesion to a variety of materials including rough surfaces; smooth unwinding and tearable by hand; water-repellent and durable. Also suitable for rough surfaces.

name: Recycled fabric duct tape, grey, 50×50 (mm×m)
description: The tesa® 4615 is a universal, more sustainable duct tape made from recycled material and our known solvent-free synthetic rubber adhesive. Features: 63% of the carrier material consists of recycled plastics (PCR); high immediate tack on various materials; smooth unwinding and hand-tearable; water-repellent and durable.
material: fabric backing; carrier made of recycled plastic (PCR)

name: Fabric adhesive tape, UV-resistant, transparent, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X20
description: tesa® 56497 Ultra Power Clear was developed for indoor and outdoor applications. Thanks to its high UV and temperature resistance it can be used under extreme weather conditions and temperatures from -10°C to +90°C. The transparent repair tape is ideal for outdoor activities and also supports (temporary) repairs at home. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Recycled Fabric Adhesive Tape Heavy Duct Tape, gray, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X50
description: The tesa® 60462 is a robust, more sustainable duct tape made from recycled material and our known solvent-free synthetic rubber adhesive. Also suitable for rough surfaces.

name: Fabric adhesive tape set, 3-piece, pink, 50×25 (mm×m)
description: The tesa® 4671 has a carrier fabric made of cellulose, does not reflect, is fluorescent and is suitable for almost any type of application. It can be easily torn by hand, removed residue-free, adheres even to rough surfaces and can be written on. The neon-colored tesa® 4671 fabric tape is ideal for marking elements or use in events. The combination of acrylate-coated fabric and a natural rubber adhesive provides high abrasion resistance. The tape is removable without residue and is available in neon green, neon yellow, neon orange and neon pink. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Double-sided removable adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X25
description: The 3M™ 9195 is a double-sided acrylic adhesive tape (carpet tape) with adhesive sides of differing tack (high tack / removable). After use, adhered carpets can be removed from solid floors or substrates residue-free. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Double-sided adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X25
description: The 3M™ 9191 is a double-sided adhesive tape characterized by a pressure-sensitive synthetic rubber adhesive with high tack and immediate adhesion. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Recycled fabric duct tape, black, 50 mm × 50 m
description: tesa® 4615 is a universal, more sustainable duct tape made from recycled material and a solvent-free synthetic rubber adhesive. Features: 63% recycled plastic (PCR) carrier, high initial tack on many materials, easy to unroll and hand-tearable, water-repellent and durable.

name: Insulating tape, 15 mm x 10 m, Color: BLACK
categoryEnglishName: Electrician’s adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
subCategoryEnglishNames: Electrician’s adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
description: The 3M™ Temflex® 165 is a universally usable, soft PVC insulating tape. Flame retardant. Self-extinguishing, good resistance to oil and solvents. For insulating, bundling, fastening and color marking. The stated shelf life for 3M™ products refers to compliance with specified storage guidelines.

name: Recycled packaging tape, brown, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X50
description: Universally applicable and recycling-friendly packaging tape. tesa® 4713 is a universally applicable packaging tape based on a fine crepe paper carrier and a natural rubber adhesive. The carrier is made from paper sourced from responsibly managed, FSC®-certified forests and other controlled sources. Solvent-free production process. Suitable for lightweight cartons up to max. 10 kg. Good adhesive strength on various cardboard qualities. Recycling-friendly tape, tested according to the INGEDE method.

name: Precision crepe tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X50
description: The tesa Precision crepe® 4334 consists of an extremely thin, tear-resistant paper carrier coated with an acrylic adhesive. The product is suitable for many painting applications for up to 6 months indoors and up to 8 weeks outdoors that require a flat, precise and sharp paint and lacquer edge. It can be used on sensitive surfaces such as glass, aluminium, HPVC and wood. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: PVC adhesive tape, soft, color: CLEAR
description: The 3M™ 471F can be used to mark hazard zones and aisles, for masking during painting work, for color markings or decorative trims. It adheres to a wide range of surfaces and can therefore be applied quickly, drip-free and without drying or cleaning effort, and can be removed again without adhesive residues. The 3M™ color and floor marking tapes are ideal for building maintenance and improving safety in facilities. The special structure of the colored PVC adhesive tapes resists scratches, abrasion, weathering and most chemicals. Easy to process, very conformable even on uneven surfaces. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage instructions.

categoryEnglishName: Electrician’s adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes

description: The 3M Scotch® 23 is an ozone-resistant ethylene-propylene rubber adhesive tape compatible with all cable sheath materials and offers excellent dielectric properties. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: PVC adhesive tape, Color: BLUE
description: The 3M™ 764i can be used for non-critical applications such as color marking and bundling. The special structure of the colored PVC adhesive tapes resists scratches, abrasion, weathering and most chemicals. Easy to process, very conformable even on uneven surfaces. description: The 3M Scotch® Super 88 and Scotch® Super 33+ are particularly elastic and UV-resistant premium adhesive tapes with very good electrical properties and resistance to moisture, alkalis, many acids and solvents. name: Floor marking tape extra strong, Color: BLUE
description: The 3M™ 971 is a very durable adhesive tape specially designed for use in areas exposed to the toughest demands. It remains highly visible even on surfaces with constant forklift traffic and frequent pallet movement. When process flows change frequently, it can be replaced quickly and cleanly. The 3M™ color and floor marking tapes are ideal for building maintenance and improving safety in facilities. The special structure of the colored PVC adhesive tapes resists scratching, abrasion, weathering and most chemicals. Easy to work with and very conformable on uneven surfaces. The specified minimum shelf life for 3M™ products refers to compliance with the prescribed storage guidelines.

description: The adhesive tape is suitable for marking hazardous areas and material locations and for marking corners and edges. description: Double-sided high-performance adhesive tape made of pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high temperature, weather, UV and solvent resistance. Excellent sealing function and vibration damping. The 3M™ 4910 is highly transparent and suitable for mounting backlit, light-transmitting signs, resin-reinforced glass, metal and high surface energy materials (HSE), decorative materials and mouldings, nameplates and logos, panel bonding and attaching stiffening elements. The stated shelf life refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines. Other 3M™ VHB™ tapes in various thicknesses and lengths available on request.

name: PVC tape, cross-ribbed, white, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for numerous application areas such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. Easy and straight tearing due to a cross-ribbed surface. For protection of smooth substrates, e.g. wood, aluminium or glass. Cross-ribbed PVC protective tape made of a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: PVC adhesive tape, white, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for numerous application areas such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. For protection of smooth substrates like wood, aluminium or glass. Smooth PVC protective tape made of a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Before bonding, check substrate suitability.

name: Packband Profi — extra strong transparent packaging tape with high-quality acrylate adhesive. For clean sealing of standard cartons. 48 mm / 66 m
description: Film adhesive tapes made of polypropylene with acrylate adhesive. Different film thicknesses for various requirements. Packing tape dispenser for comfortable working and cutting without scissors or knives.

name: Packaging tape set, 6-piece (color: CLEAR)
description: Universal packaging tape suitable for all common hand dispensers; quiet unwind. The tesapack® 4024 is an almost invisible PP tape with UV, ageing and temperature resistance for an attractive appearance and longer storage life. Features: quiet unwind; high UV/ageing/temperature resistance for longer storage; well suited for use with common hand dispensers. Note: stated minimum shelf life refers to compliance with recommended storage conditions.

name: PVC adhesive tape, yellow, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universal adhesive tapes for numerous applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. For protection of smooth substrates like wood, aluminium or glass. Smooth PVC protective tape made from a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Before bonding, check substrate suitability.

name: Fabric adhesive tape, red, Width×Length (mm×m): 38X25
description: Fabric tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair work. PE-laminated for water resistance. Suitable for a variety of masking and covering tasks; designed for applications with high tear resistance. Easy to unwind and hand-tear, abrasion-resistant. Indoor and outdoor use up to 2 weeks. Universal for repairs, protecting, masking and packaging. UV-resistant, very good tensile strength and abrasion resistance. Good adhesion on rough surfaces. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: Cloth adhesive tape, black, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X50
description: Cloth tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair tasks. PE laminated so also water-repellent. Suitable for a variety of masking and covering tasks. Especially for applications with high tear-resistance requirements. Easy to unwind, tear off and abrasion-resistant. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 2 weeks. Universally usable for repair jobs and many applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packing. Before bonding, check substrate suitability.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Tape, for permanent and strong bonding, black
description: Double-sided high-performance tape made from pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, resistant to temperature, weathering, UV and solvents. Excellent sealing function and vibration damping. Suitable for indoor and outdoor use; quick and easy to apply and provides durable performance. Use on various surfaces such as powder coatings. Specified shelf life refers to correct storage. Other 3M VHB tapes available on request.

name: Fine conformable flat crepe (masking) tape with acrylate adhesive. Suitable for most substrates. Secure masking removable up to 14 days outdoors. Medium heat resistance.
description: Very thin, flexible and tear-resistant masking tapes for crisp, flat paint edges. Special impregnation of the paper carrier provides high wet strength. Very easy to unwind, ideal for double masking.

name: Filament adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 25X50
description: The 3M™ 8954 consists of PP with high-strength fiberglass reinforcement (longitudinal and transverse) with very high tear and abrasion resistance. Suitable for dangerous goods transport packaging. For bundling and securing, e.g. pallet or product securing. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Adhesive Tape, for permanent and strong bonding, grey

name: Polyethylene slip tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X16
description: The 3M 5423 protects surfaces with excellent abrasion resistance and creates a sliding surface that allows contact without abrasion. No additional lubricants are necessary. It is chemical-resistant, transparent and can be processed into die-cuts thanks to a release liner. The stated shelf life refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Fine conformable flat crepe with acrylate adhesive. Suitable for most substrates. Secure masking removable up to 14 days outdoors. Medium heat resistance.
description: Very thin, flexible and tear-resistant masking tapes for razor-sharp, flat paint edges. Special impregnation of the paper carrier provides high wet strength. Very easy to unwind, ideal for double masking. Fiber reinforcements.

name: Fabric adhesive tape, silver, 48X50 (mm×m)
description: Cloth tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair jobs. PE laminated so water-repellent. Suitable for a variety of covering and masking tasks. Especially for applications with high tear resistance requirements. Easy to unwind, tear off by hand and abrasion resistant. Usable indoors and outdoors for up to 2 weeks. Universally applicable for many uses such as repairing, protecting, masking and packing. Universally usable for repair work. Recommendation: Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Adhesive Tape, for durable and strong bonding, black
description: Double-sided high-performance adhesive tape made from pure acrylate adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high temperature, weather, UV and solvent resistance. Excellent sealing function, vibration-damping. The 3M™ 5962F offers optimal conformability to bonded surfaces, allowing thin and textured surfaces to be bonded across the full area without stress. The stated minimum shelf life refers to compliance with specified storage guidelines. Other 3M™ VHB™ tapes in various thicknesses and lengths are available on request.

name: Carpet double-sided adhesive tape, white, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X25
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for many applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. Indoor and outdoor use up to 2 weeks. Fabric tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair work. PE-laminated and water-repellent. Suitable for many masking tasks and high tear resistance. Easy to unwind and tear, abrasion-resistant. Double-sided fabric tape (carpet tape) for permanent bonding. Good adhesion even on rough substrates. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Tape, high temperature resistant, gray
description: Double-sided high-performance tape made of pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high resistance to temperature, weathering, UV and solvents. Excellent sealing function, vibration-damping. The 3M™ GPH-110GF consists of a conformable foam core and withstands high temperatures. Used to quickly and easily create a strong, durable, permanent bond. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines. Other 3M™ VHB™ tapes in different thicknesses and lengths are available on request.
backing: acrylic foam (conformable foam core); release liner: siliconized PE film

name: Recycled packaging tape, brown, Width×Length 50×66 (mm×m)
description: Universally usable and recycling-friendly packaging tape. tesa® 60412 consists of 90% recycled PET carrier and a water-based acrylate adhesive.

name: Double-sided adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X25
description: The double-sided installation tape tesa® 51960 consists of a PP film and an adhesive made of modified acrylate. It is suitable for professionals who want to install carpets with foam or textile backing professionally and securely. Because the installation tape offers differentiated adhesive performance, it guarantees a secure hold on almost all substrates, yet can be removed without problems and without residue. In addition, it can be torn by hand and is resistant to moisture and mild chemicals.

name: VHB™ adhesive tape, white, Width×Length (mm×m): 12X33
description: Double-sided high-performance adhesive tape made from pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high temperature, weather, UV and solvent resistance. Excellent sealing function, vibration damping. The 3M™ LSE-110WF is specially designed for challenging bonding of low-energy plastics and composite materials for indoor and outdoor use. The indicated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines. Other 3M™ VHB™ tapes in various thicknesses and lengths are available on request.

name: PVC adhesive tape, orange, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for numerous applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. For protection of smooth substrates such as wood, aluminum or glass. Smooth PVC protective tape made of a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: Double-sided adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 12X50
description: The 3M™ GPT-020F is a double-sided adhesive tape characterised by high moisture resistance, very high initial tack, very good shear strength at elevated temperatures and good UV resistance.

name: tesafix® 4965 double-sided clear polyester tape, 19×50 mm×m
description: The tesafix® 4965 is a double-sided, durable, clear polyester adhesive tape with acrylic adhesive, suitable for indoor and outdoor use. Ideal for bonding glass, metal, smooth tiles, treated wood and many plastics such as ABS and even EPDM because it is highly resistant to plasticizers. It withstands temperatures up to 100 °C and is resistant to moisture, certain chemicals, plasticizers and UV radiation.

name: Fine crepe adhesive tape set natural, Width×Length (mm×m): 18X50
description: Universally applicable adhesive tapes for numerous applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. Lightly creped tape with good tack for short-term masking work on smooth substrates indoors. Temperature-resistant up to 60 °C. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: Packaging Tape Set, 6-piece, Color: BEIGE
description: Universal packaging tape compatible with all common hand dispensers, rolls off quietly. The tesapack® 4120 is a universal PVC packaging tape with a strong natural rubber adhesive. Even and quiet unwind. Very suitable for use with all common hand dispensers. Minimum shelf life depends on observing storage guidelines.

name: tesafix® 4952 Mirror adhesive tape
description: Design: The tesa® 4952 is a double-sided PE foam adhesive tape with acrylic adhesive. Permanently strong bonds and high initial tack. High tensile and shear strength as well as high temperature and aging resistance. Ideal for mirror bonding. Use: For permanently fixing or mounting components indoors on smooth surfaces. Note: The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.
